column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Beautiful pastries
column2: and hands down my favorite chocolate chip cookie
column3: just edging out Tiny Boxwoods. I'm not a huge fan of the atmosphere- it's always packed
column4: and I feel like it has a bit of an elitist/snobby vibe. Also
column5: parking is impossible. I'll take my CCC to-go
column6: but it is totally worth the hassle!
